message.content: {"id": "23787", "title": "Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields", "description": "Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. The text fields in the Project Properties Info page look bad on all motif platforms. On motif platforms, these text fields get automatic borders, which identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out more.", "OB": "On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders and on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, they have different colored backgrounds, making them stand out more.", "EB": "The Project Properties Info page should be modified to use non-text field components instead of these text fields.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right-click Properties, and navigate to the subsequent Info page. Observe the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type, etc.) on motif platforms as well as Solaris/AIX/HPUX."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'OB': 'this looks fine on windows, but on motif these text fields all get automaticborders, which identify them as user input targets.Additionally, onSolaris/AIX/HPUX these fields have different coloured backgrounds which makethem stand out much worse ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'select a Project, rightclickProperties on the subsequent Info page the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type,etc.) '}
